thread.title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway nearing deal to buy Precision Castparts - WSJ
thread.title_full: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway nearing deal to buy Precision Castparts - WSJ | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway nearing deal to buy Precision Castparts - WSJ
text: Aug 8 Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc is nearing a deal to buy Precision Castparts Corp , in an acquisition that could be valued at more than $30 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter. (Reporting by Lisa Shumaker in Chicago; Editing by Alison Williams)
